name: Beach Parry
description:
You're chilling in the beach when a black hole appears and threatens to swallow you.

How long can you survive until your inevitable demise?

Beach Parry is an arcade game where your objective is to keep yourself away from a black hole by parrying fish and foes alike flying around the screen!

Controls:

  • Space - Parry
  • A/D or Left/Right Arrows - Move
  • Escape - Quit Game

Beach Parry was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2021, and was developed by:

Alcaval - Programming

Virdi22 - Programming

Dededec - Programming

Tremov - Art

Hehelozcer (@mashigraphic on Instagram) - UI Design

Credits to:

Game Over Music Jingle by  Kenney Vleugels (Kenney.nl)
